edu.ccsu.interfaces

Interface ProductFactory


  • public interface ProductFactory
    Interface that specifies methods that can be used to create different devices and sensors
    NOTE: Methods will return null if you try to use port that is already in use
    Author:
    Adrian, Kim, GaYoung

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      edu.ccsu.interfaces.Device makeDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Creates a device based on the name and returns it
      edu.ccsu.interfaces.Fan makeFan(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Use method to create Fan device (currently supports the Grove MiniFan v1.1)
      edu.ccsu.interfaces.LightEnabledDevice makeLightEnabledDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Generates a light enabled device (currently supports the LED)
      edu.ccsu.interfaces.ScreenEnabledDevice makeScreenEnabledDevice(java.lang.String device, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Used to create a screen enabled device (currently supports the LCD display)
      ccsu.edu.grovepicomponents.Sensor makeSensor(java.lang.String sensor, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String portNumber)
      Creates a sensor based on the name and returns it

    • Method Detail

      • makeDevice

        edu.ccsu.interfaces.Device makeDevice(java.lang.String device,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String portNumber)
                               throws edu.ccsu.error.PortInUseException
        Creates a device based on the name and returns it
        Parameters:
        device - declares which kind of device to make (device can be "LCD","LED")
        name - name of device
        portNumber - port number
        Returns:
        Device
        Throws:
        edu.ccsu.error.PortInUseException - When attempt to set port number which is already in use, PortInUseException is thrown

      • makeFan

        edu.ccsu.interfaces.Fan makeFan(java.lang.String device,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String portNumber)
                         throws edu.ccsu.error.PortInUseException
        Use method to create Fan device (currently supports the Grove MiniFan v1.1)
        Parameters:
        device - decides what kind of device to make (device currently can be "minifan")
        name - name of Fan
        portNumber - port number
        Returns:
        Fan
        Throws:
        edu.ccsu.error.PortInUseException - When attempt to set port number which is already in use, PortInUseException is thrown

        Generates a light enabled device (currently supports the LED)

        name - name of device
        portNumber - port number
        Returns:
        LightEnabledDevice
        Throws:
        edu.ccsu.error.PortInUseException - When attempt to set port number which is already in use, PortInUseException is thrown
